name: SGD Bodega / SGD Coffee
description:
SGD Coffee is a 5-time award-winning coffee at the prestigious International Contest of Coffees Roasted at Origin organized by the Agence pour la Valorisation des Produits Agricoles (AVPA) in Paris, France.

2017 - Medaille Gourmet
2019 - Medaille Gourmet
2024 - Medaille Argent (Silver)
2025 - Medaille Bronze & Medaille Or (Gold)

AVPA PARIS is composed of 1,000 member-organizations worldwide.

SGD Coffee is a collective effort of coffee growers, farm technicians, processors, roasters, cuppers, baristas, community elders, government agencies, organization partners, coffee advocates, and our beloved customers.
address: 45 Maalalahanin, Diliman, Quezon City, 1101 Kalakhang Maynila
